title: Heinz-Josef Fabry
text: Heinz-Josef Fabry (<a href="Winterberg">Winterberg</a>, 14 December 1944) is a German <a href="Hebraist">Hebraist</a> and <a href="deacon">deacon</a> of the Catholic Theological Faculty of <a href="Bonn%20University">Bonn University</a>. Following the death of his teacher <a href="Gerhard%20Johannes%20Botterweck">Gerhard Johannes Botterweck</a> in 1981 he was co-editor of the 15 volume "Theological dictionary of the Old Testament" with the Swedish scholar <a href="Helmer%20Ringgren">Helmer Ringgren</a> (translated into English by David E. Green). He is also author of various studies on the <a href="Dead%20Sea%20scrolls">Dead Sea scrolls</a>.
